lankawe wamanshika wyaparaya shakthimath wimak samanga , ee.ee. gunasinha mahathage wruththiya samithi wyaparaya diyawima aarambha wi atha.wathukaraye prathama wruththiya samithiya pihituwimata em.ji.mendis mahatha samath wimath samanga wathu kamkaruwan kolambaa pawathi mayi dina samarumwalata sahabhagi wuha.ee samangama gramiya pradeshawala gowi janaya da mayi dina samarumwalata sahabhagiwimata patan gena thibe.dosthara es.ee.wikramasinha, udukandawala siri saranankara himi, pilip gunawardhana, an.am.perera, kolwin aar da silwa, pitar kenaman , am.ji.mendis, ji.ji.wiliyam, al.dabliw.panditha aadi nayakayinge manga penwima anuwa kriyathmaka wu wamanshika wruththiya samithi, wada karana janathawata balapana prashna wenuwen genagiya dirgha kalina kamkaru wyaparaye prathipalayak lesa paya ate wada dinayak ha 1956 sita mayi dinaya rajaye ha paudgalika anshaye niwadu dinayak lesa prakashayata path kerini.1957 sita sewaka arthasadhaka aramudala athi karana ladde em.ji.mendis ha pitar kenaman yana mahathwaru meheyawu the, rabar asurum kamkaru wada warjanaye prathipalayak lesaya.wamanshika wyaparaya pawathwanu labu wada karana janathawage sahayogitha dinaya wu mayi dinaya 1956n pasu siyaluma deshapalana paksha thama deshapalana pakshawala balaya pradarshanaya karana dinayak lesa pathkara gena, thama pakshayata adala warna bhawitha karamin me dinaya pawathwimata katayuthu karayi.eheth kamkaru panthiye aramuna ehi natha.
